fcttext_metric: Showers early. Low 8C.
title: Sunday
fcttext: Showers ending early. Lows overnight in the upper 40s.

fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
title: Sunday Night
fcttext: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

fcttext_metric: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
title: Monday
fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

title: Monday Night

fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.
